00008 TConvolution::TConvolution(const char* name, TF1* f1, TF1* f2, bool addScale, Int_t stepsPerPoint): _convolution(0) {
00009   Init(name,f1,f2,addScale,stepsPerPoint);
00010 }
00011 
00012 TConvolution::~TConvolution() {
00013   if (_convolution) delete _convolution;
00014   if (_f1) delete _f1;
00015   if (_f2) delete _f2;
00016 }

00019 void TConvolution::Init(const char* name, TF1* f1, TF1* f2, bool addScale, Int_t stepsPerPoint) {
00020 
00021   _name = std::string(name);
00022 
00023   _f1 = (TF1*) f1->Clone();
00024   _nPar1 = _f1->GetNpar();
00025   _f1->GetRange(_f1Rmin,_f1Rmax);
00026 
00027   _f2 = (TF1*) f2->Clone();
00028   _nPar2 = _f2->GetNpar();
00029   _f2->GetRange(_f2Rmin,_f2Rmax);
00030 
00031   _baseNpar = _nPar1+_nPar2;
00032 
00033   _Rmin = _f1Rmin + _f2Rmin;
00034   _Rmax = _f1Rmax + _f2Rmax;
00035 
00036   _stepsPerPoint = stepsPerPoint;
00037 
00038   _addScale = addScale;
00039 
00040 }
00041 
00042 
00043 TF1* TConvolution::GetConvolutedFunction() {
00044 
00045   int extraNpar=0;
00046   if (_addScale) _scaleParNumber = _baseNpar + extraNpar++;
00047 
00048   if (_convolution) delete _convolution;
00049   _convolution = new TF1(_name.c_str(),this,_Rmin,_Rmax,_baseNpar+extraNpar,"TConvolution");
00050 
00051   for (Int_t i=0; i< _nPar1;i++) {
00052     _convolution->SetParameter(i,_f1->GetParameter(i));
00053     _convolution->SetParName(i,((std::string(_f1->GetName())) + "_" + _f1->GetParName(i) ).c_str());
00054   }
00055   for (Int_t i=0; i< _nPar2;i++) {
00056     _convolution->SetParameter(i+_nPar1,_f2->GetParameter(i));
00057     _convolution->SetParName(i+_nPar1,((std::string(_f2->GetName()))+"_"+_f2->GetParName(i) ).c_str());
00058   }
00059   if (_addScale) {
00060     _convolution->SetParameter(_scaleParNumber,1.);
00061     _convolution->SetParName(_scaleParNumber,"C");
00062   }
00063   return _convolution;
00064 }
00065 
00066 
00067 Double_t TConvolution::integrand(Double_t t, Double_t x0) {
00068   return  _f1->Eval(t) *  _f2->Eval(x0-t);
00069 }
00070 
00071 Double_t TConvolution::convolutionFkt(Double_t *x, Double_t *par){
00072   _f1->SetParameters(par);
00073   _f2->SetParameters(&(par[_nPar1]));
00074 
00075   Double_t stepSize = ( _f1Rmax - _f1Rmin ) / _stepsPerPoint;
00076 
00077   Double_t integral = 0;
00078   for (Double_t t=_f1Rmin;t <= _f1Rmax; t+=stepSize) integral += integrand(t,x[0]);
00079   integral *= stepSize;
00080 
00081   if (_addScale) return  par[_scaleParNumber] * integral;
00082   return integral;
00083 }
